ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Three: Rocket Sea Part 1 of 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
“CHAPTER THREE: ROCKET SEA”
The epic account of James Bond’s exploits during World War II continues, by superstar JEFF PARKER (Suicide Squad, Fantastic Four) and BOB Q (The Lone Ranger)!
Aboard a Royal Navy submarine, Lieutenant James Bond and crew encounter deadly German warships and bombers! Can the British crew keep their nerve and evade…or will they sink into a watery grave?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | John Cassaday | 1 | B | Cover B | Declan Shalvey | 2 | C | Cover C | Kev Walker | 3 | D | Cover D | Ibrahim Moustafa | 4 | E | Cover E | Bob Q | 5 | F/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | John Cassaday | 6 | G/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | John Cassaday | 7 |
